ygData.subject: SV: Mend, my most useless and irritating skill.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Once you reach skill 100 and level 20, mend will never fail again. At least thats my experience.
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>
>
>
>It seems to me that the chances of it failing are a LOT higher if you use
>Mend and you are at 50% health or lower. I'm level 24 and my skill is only
>90 (never bothered practicing it when sitting in town babbling with people,
>I'm going to have to start now. :)). If I use it when I only have 2 bubbles
>of health gone, it seems to work almost all the time. I can only recall it
>failing twice, in recent memory, and only worsening my wounds once. I
>always try and use it when I've lost 2 bubbles.


Once you reach skill 100 and level 20, mend will never fail again. At least thats my experience.
